- - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Jim, It’s nice to meet you via email. I wanted to follow up on the email below, please consider me your point of contact at MBO. Please let me know if you have any questions regarding the Independent Consultant Project Set-Up Form <http://link.mbopartners.com/ol/0xEFfZmddHNcoUZ1_u-Nb_mgz3iQN8jlq65yDbq2lMIt3kF6L7yJPEjr1YIDT8Z0dufDUUQVGpQ80glWH-WQbo5P2vJQCki-FjjwjefPZokTIfJ2xNVz_vWI7EkSrPWsi2WeBUQ-dHJ0Sj6FfYYXiC7mB6F6cTeur1bMENcOlgEcq-823r-YLeOZqUWq2XPjvRuDHUVTw-zO02uVFLdnsd4si2h0xGQlZc7O-zjEz-UxmR4V_-4l2BdVw95mGcQx9yqxdHTh6bnhTPE7SLfgwbrx78sgbhRmoYcgSXfTe2niNtmqaSAjpRSIsW0_BQ5EFhl8K-ctnCKQh0NwbcIvG33p3m9l/1gwVMM7QNFhXs0g45v6WMqj_izvFaIvmuLNwRuX1ncI81gd3f-3IPVKgpfF-I7s8YeyOBAwUFp51_y9XFPOAcJRB9OFiO1O9Uj78lJ7papkDRKRM7MBx-rqa_m8Xp5OSllqTBEQaf2Vjb1vPcYoBrwftE5EVbTuU31HbcNUBmgM_pKxT0ZyhZ56a0Wau4VD_1AzbZnxoz_eu-UWVOb5Dmts0uAR3zBV1WQ%2C%2C>. I look forward to working with you. Best,Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Don and Peggy Johnson [mailto:donandpeggy2011@gmail.com] Sent: Sunday, September 15, 2013 8:43 PM To: Claytor, Jim (ACS-S&C) Cc: Sara Conde Subject: Contracting Hi Jim,
Thank you for the opportunity for me to provide IT support to Honeywell for the Boyne City Infinite System and ACS Compliance Initiative. At this point in the process, I would like to introduce you to Sara Conde, my contact at MBO Partners, Inc.
MBO’s service is designed for independent consultants and small businesses that want to engage smoothly and easily with their clients. MBO takes care of my back-office administrative support, including invoicing, collecting payments, withholding taxes, insurance coverage, and much more, so that I can stay focused on providing you with the best possible service. For more information, please refer to MBO’s one-page document <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Introduction.pdf> that explains how they work with consultants and their clients. <http://link.mbopartners.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Introduction.pdf?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCbFVPuk5iy%2FuUI6Dh0TbPd%2FLC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> As a function of this service, MBO Partners will be invoicing for and accepting payments on my behalf. To get everything fully initiated, when you are ready, please fill out and return the form below:
- Independent Consultant Project Set-Up Form <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Independent_Consultant_Project_Set-Up_Paper_Form.pdf> – Please complete, sign, and return
Additionally, the following links provide important information on MBO that you will find useful:
- MBO Payment Information <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Wire_and_Payment_Information.pdf> - W-9 for MBO Partners <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_W-9.pdf> - Certificate of Liability Insurance <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Sample_COI.pdf>
If you have any questions about MBO Partners you can reach out directly to Sara Conde (copied above) at 703-793-6028 <tel:703-793-6028> or via email at sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>. Thanks again, and I look forward to working with you and the Honeywell gang again! Peggy Johnson Home Phone: 231-347-0012Cell Phone: 231-838-1596
